overview: Schoolhouse Rock takes children on a fantastic scholastic learning adventure! The same great songs you knew and loved as a kid are now available to a whole new generation. Each volume in this special collection features exclusive bonus programming of some of today's hottest rock stars singing their favorite Schoolhouse Rock song!  Learning about science, the body and the solar system is easy when you sing along with Science Rock
title: Schoolhouse Rock! (25th Anniversary Collection)
